V OF 1991 [2nd April, 1991] An Act to prohibit the employment of children in certain occupations and to regulate the conditions of work of children PART I PRELIMINARY 1. Short Title, Extent and Commencement. (1) This Act may be called the Employment of Children Act, 1991. (2) It extends to the whole of Pakistan. (3) The provisions of this Act, shall come into force at once. 2. Definitions.
